title: Notebook - Notes, To-Do, AI
description:
Take Notes Your Way — With AI and Beyond
Stay  productive and organized with Zoho Notebook — the free note app that lets you capture, plan, and manage everything. Whether you're writing notes, creating a to-do list, setting goals, or drafting a digital diary, this smart notes app is built to match your style — now powered by Notebook AI.

"Google Play Store's Best App of 2017"

*SMART NOTE-TAKING OPTIONS*
-This is not just a simple notepad — it's your all-in-one notes app, memo app, planner, and diary app:
-Create rich text notes with checklists, images, and audio — all in one place
-Build dedicated checklists, to-do lists, and task trackers
-Use voice notes or convert speech to text notes
-Scan textbooks, handwritten notes, or documents into searchable PDFs
-Use the Photo Card to save memories and add images to daily notes
-Upload PDFs, Word files, and more — perfect for organizing ideas

*NOTEBOOK AI – BUILT-IN INTELLIGENCE*
-AI Notes Generator: Create summaries, outlines, or to-do lists from raw ideas instantly.
-AI Meeting Notes & Transcripts: Record or upload audio/video to get accurate, real-time transcriptions of meetings, lectures, or podcasts.
-AI Mind Map Generator: Convert long notes into clear mind maps to visualize ideas and structure your thoughts.
-AI Grammar Checker: Fix grammar, polish tone, and eliminate redundancy with smart suggestions.
-AI Note Translator: Translate your notes into multiple languages with ease.
-AI Shape Recognition: Perfect rough sketches and diagrams with auto-detected shapes.

*ORGANIZE YOUR NOTES, YOUR WAY*
-Group notes using Nested Collections and Custom Sort
-Lock notes app: Add a passcode or fingerprint to protect sensitive info
-Add tags to categorize and organize ideas across notebooks
-Keep your planner, checklists, and daily notes secure and searchable

*CROSS-DEVICE ACCESS & CLOUD SYNC*
-Write anywhere — your notes sync across devices:
-Android, iOS, macOS, and Web (https://notebook.zoho.com/)
-Use the Web Clipper to save articles and research instantly
-Continue your note taking on any device, anytime

*YOUR PERSONALIZED SMART NOTES APP*
-Choose covers, themes, and note colors
-Use Sketch Card for drawing or formulas
-Use the Video Card to upload recordings and add chapter markers
-Float sticky notes with Picture-in-Picture (PiP)
-View in grid or landscape, and stay distraction-free

*SHARE & COLLABORATE WITH EASE*
-Share notes as PDFs or public links
-Collaborate via email or third-party apps

*BUILT FOR ANDROID — EXCLUSIVE FEATURES*
-Widgets: Create or view notes from your home screen without opening the app.
-Home Screen Shortcuts: Pin your favorite note or notebook directly to the home screen.
-Launcher Shortcuts: Long-press the app icon to quickly create notes or checklists.
-Quick Actions: Instantly open a note or notebook via contextual menus.
-Notification Tray Access: Open or add a note straight from the notification bar.
-Quick Settings Tile: Tap once from Quick Settings to open a new notecard.
-Multi-window Support: Use Notebook alongside other apps for seamless multitasking.
-Open Note in New Window: View a note in a separate window for better focus.
-Picture-in-Picture (PiP): Keep a note floating while using other apps.
-Keyboard Shortcuts: Use Bluetooth or USB keyboards to quickly format or navigate.
-Print Notes: Print your notes using Android’s built-in print framework.

*NOTEBOOK FOR DAILY LIFE*
-Use as your planner, task manager, or goal tracker
-Organize travel plans, events, or grocery checklists
-Maintain a secure digital journal app with a private notebook
-Add reminders to keep track of tasks and ideas
-Write diary with lock — stay secure and personal

Download Zoho Notebook — the smartest way to take notes with AI, organize your thoughts, and stay productive. From sticky notes to daily planners, it's your best note taking app.

Whether it's for class, work, or personal — it's the only note taking, diary, and checklist app you’ll ever need.
descriptionHTML:
Take Notes Your Way — With AI and Beyond
Stay productive and organized with Zoho Notebook — the free note app that lets you capture, plan, and manage everything. Whether you're writing notes, creating a to-do list, setting goals, or drafting a digital diary, this smart notes app is built to match your style — now powered by Notebook AI.

"Google Play Store's Best App of 2017"

*SMART NOTE-TAKING OPTIONS*
-This is not just a simple notepad — it's your all-in-one notes app, memo app, planner, and diary app:
-Create rich text notes with checklists, images, and audio — all in one place
-Build dedicated checklists, to-do lists, and task trackers
-Use voice notes or convert speech to text notes
-Scan textbooks, handwritten notes, or documents into searchable PDFs
-Use the Photo Card to save memories and add images to daily notes
-Upload PDFs, Word files, and more — perfect for organizing ideas

*NOTEBOOK AI – BUILT-IN INTELLIGENCE*
-AI Notes Generator: Create summaries, outlines, or to-do lists from raw ideas instantly.
-AI Meeting Notes & Transcripts: Record or upload audio/video to get accurate, real-time transcriptions of meetings, lectures, or podcasts.
-AI Mind Map Generator: Convert long notes into clear mind maps to visualize ideas and structure your thoughts.
-AI Grammar Checker: Fix grammar, polish tone, and eliminate redundancy with smart suggestions.
-AI Note Translator: Translate your notes into multiple languages with ease.
-AI Shape Recognition: Perfect rough sketches and diagrams with auto-detected shapes.

*ORGANIZE YOUR NOTES, YOUR WAY*
-Group notes using Nested Collections and Custom Sort
-Lock notes app: Add a passcode or fingerprint to protect sensitive info
-Add tags to categorize and organize ideas across notebooks
-Keep your planner, checklists, and daily notes secure and searchable

*CROSS-DEVICE ACCESS & CLOUD SYNC*
-Write anywhere — your notes sync across devices:
-Android, iOS, macOS, and Web (https://notebook.zoho.com/)
-Use the Web Clipper to save articles and research instantly
-Continue your note taking on any device, anytime

*YOUR PERSONALIZED SMART NOTES APP*
-Choose covers, themes, and note colors
-Use Sketch Card for drawing or formulas
-Use the Video Card to upload recordings and add chapter markers
-Float sticky notes with Picture-in-Picture (PiP)
-View in grid or landscape, and stay distraction-free

*SHARE & COLLABORATE WITH EASE*
-Share notes as PDFs or public links
-Collaborate via email or third-party apps

*BUILT FOR ANDROID — EXCLUSIVE FEATURES*
-Widgets: Create or view notes from your home screen without opening the app.
-Home Screen Shortcuts: Pin your favorite note or notebook directly to the home screen.
-Launcher Shortcuts: Long-press the app icon to quickly create notes or checklists.
-Quick Actions: Instantly open a note or notebook via contextual menus.
-Notification Tray Access: Open or add a note straight from the notification bar.
-Quick Settings Tile: Tap once from Quick Settings to open a new notecard.
-Multi-window Support: Use Notebook alongside other apps for seamless multitasking.
-Open Note in New Window: View a note in a separate window for better focus.
-Picture-in-Picture (PiP): Keep a note floating while using other apps.
-Keyboard Shortcuts: Use Bluetooth or USB keyboards to quickly format or navigate.
-Print Notes: Print your notes using Android’s built-in print framework.

*NOTEBOOK FOR DAILY LIFE*
-Use as your planner, task manager, or goal tracker
-Organize travel plans, events, or grocery checklists
-Maintain a secure digital journal app with a private notebook
-Add reminders to keep track of tasks and ideas
-Write diary with lock — stay secure and personal

Download Zoho Notebook — the smartest way to take notes with AI, organize your thoughts, and stay productive. From sticky notes to daily planners, it's your best note taking app.

Whether it's for class, work, or personal — it's the only note taking, diary, and checklist app you’ll ever need.
summary: Note-taking & Notepad: Take notes, to-do lists, daily tasks, memos & organizer

title: OtterAI Transcribe Voice Notes
description:
Never take team meeting or lecture notes again. Get an AI meeting assistant that records audio, takes notes, voice memos, automatically captures slides, and transcribes voice summaries. Show live caption in real time. Great for in-person recordings and online meetings. Also available on the web. English, Spanish, French only.

Condense a 1 hour meeting into 30 seconds. Otter transcribes all your meetings, interviews, lectures, and everyday voice conversations in real time. Get automated notes for in-person, Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams. 

KEY FEATURES
★ AI chat: get answers, write emails
★ AI meeting note taker & real-time AI transcription
★ Audio recorder 
★ Transcribe notes live
★ Automated meeting note taker, voice memos & summarizer
★ AI Channels: Instant chat on various channels
★ Share & collaborate 
★ All notes are searchable & shareable 
★ Edit & highlight
★ Organize & export
★ Import & sync

Many Uses
★ Save time - automatic note taking
★ Keep team in sync - share notes and action items 
★ Record and transcribe interviews, lectures, podcasts, videos, webinars, keynotes
★ Provide live captioning to anyone with accessibility needs

Record & Transcribe Live
★ Record instantly in one tap, with widget and shortcut 
★ Transcribe in real time (when online) with high accuracy
★ Automatic note taking
★ Highlight the key points to review later
★ Insert photos of whiteboard discussions, slides, etc.
★ Scroll back to grab a quote or revisit a point
★ Input audio via built-in mic or Bluetooth device

Enrich Notes with AI
★ AI meeting note taker 
★ Punctuate, capitalize, and break paragraphs automatically
★ Identify speakers (after some training)
★ Automated Slide Capture during virtual team meetings
★ Automated Summarizer after all team meetings

Share & Collaborate
★ Start a meeting recording inside a group to share the transcript live
★ Invite workplace team members to view, edit, and highlight collaboratively. All highlights are captured in the Takeaways panel.
★ Within the Takeaways panel, add comments & assign action items.
★ Share externally via links

Search & Playback
★ Search the text so you don't have to scrub through the whole audio
★ Playback at adjustable speeds
★ Follow along the highlighted word as the audio is playing
★ Tap on any word to jump the audio to that spot

Edit & Highlight
★ Edit the text to correct any errors
★ Tag the speakers to label the paragraphs and train Otter to identify meeting speakers 
★ Highlight sentences in one tap

Organize & Export
★ Organize your conversations and notes into personal folders
★ Copy to clipboard, or share directly into other apps
★ Export text as PDF, TXT, or SRT
★ Export audio as MP3

Import & Sync
★ Import audio (aac, m4a, mp3, wav, wma) and video (avi, mov, mp4, mpg, wmv)
★ Upload from Call Recorder - ACR or other call recording apps
★ Sync with your calendars to get reminders to record your teams meeting and auto-title your notes
★ Import your contacts so it's easier to share
★ Automatically back up your data to Otter’s cloud & access securely from any device

Otter Pro
★ Bulk export
★ More playback speeds and skip silence

Requirements
※ Android 6.0 & up
※ Internet connection for transcribing
※ Account creation. See our Terms of Service: otter.ai/terms-of-service

We take security and privacy very seriously. Your data is confidential with Otter. We do not sell or share your data with 3rd parties. You have full control to delete your data permanently. Learn more at https://otter.ai/privacy

Contact Us
▶ Support: https://help.otter.ai
▶ Facebook: @OtterAI
▶ LinkedIn: Otter.ai
▶ X (Twitter): @otter_ai
▶ Web: otter.ai

title: Notebook AI
description:
Transform Any Content Into Smart Notes with AI

Notebook AI turns your videos, audio files, PDFs and YouTube links into organized, structured notes instantly. Now with intelligent chat feature to interact with your notes!

WHY CHOOSE NOTEBOOK AI

Multi-Source Note Creation
Upload or paste content from YouTube videos, audio recordings, video files, and PDF documents. Our AI processes any format and creates comprehensive notes automatically.

Chat With Your Notes
Ask questions about your notes and get instant answers. Search for specific information, request summaries, or explore topics deeper through natural conversation with AI.

Smart Organization
Create custom folders to organize notes by subject, project, or topic. Easily search, filter, and manage all your content in one place.

Multi-Language Support
Process content in multiple languages and generate notes in your preferred language. Perfect for international students and global professionals.

Privacy First
Your uploaded files are processed instantly and deleted immediately after note generation. We never store your original content permanently.

PERFECT FOR STUDENTS

Transform lecture recordings into study-ready notes. Convert educational YouTube videos into structured learning materials. Process research papers and academic PDFs into digestible summaries. Chat with your study notes to prepare for exams.

IDEAL FOR PROFESSIONALS

Turn meeting recordings into actionable summaries. Convert training videos and webinars into reference documents. Process business reports and whitepapers into key insights. Ask questions about your work notes instantly.

GREAT FOR RESEARCHERS

Convert interview recordings into organized transcripts. Process conference presentations and talks into research notes. Analyze academic papers and studies efficiently. Chat with your research to find connections.

USEFUL FOR CONTENT CREATORS

Research competitor videos and transform them into content ideas. Turn podcasts and industry talks into actionable insights. Process multiple sources into comprehensive research notes. Query your content library for quick reference.

HOW IT WORKS

Simply upload your file or paste a YouTube link. Our advanced AI analyzes the content and generates structured, well-organized notes within seconds. Save notes to custom folders, edit as needed, and chat with them anytime for deeper insights.

KEY CAPABILITIES

Unlimited note generation from multiple sources. Instant AI processing with high accuracy. Interactive chat feature for all your notes. Custom folder system for perfect organization. Full note editing and customization. Fast processing speed for long content. Clean and intuitive user interface. Works offline for saved notes. Regular feature updates and improvements.

SIMPLE THREE STEP PROCESS

Upload your file or paste a YouTube link. AI instantly creates structured notes with key points. Save, organize, chat, and edit your notes anytime.

Download Notebook AI today and experience the future of intelligent note-taking. Turn information overload into organized, searchable knowledge you can chat with.

title: Plaud: AI Note Taker
description:
[Product Introduction]

Plaud is building the world's most trusted AI work companion for professionals to elevate productivity and performance through note-taking solutions, trusted by over 1,500,000 users worldwide. With a mission to amplify human intelligence, Plaud is building the next-generation intelligence infrastructure and interfaces to capture, extract, and utilize what you say, hear, see, and think.

Plaud offers a range of AI note-taking devices and solution, each designed to fit different work and life scenarios.
- Plaud Note: The world’s No.1 AI note taker
- Plaud Note Pro: The world’s most advanced AI note taker
- Plaud NotePin / Plaud NotePin S: The world’s most wearable AI note taker
- Plaud Desktop: Capture online meetings natively from the Plaud Desktop App, without a meeting bot.

Whether it’s an in-person meeting, a phone call, an on-the-go conversation, or an online meeting, Plaud keeps you fully present while it handles the notes.


[Plaud Intelligence]

From capturing ideas on Plaud devices to retrieving and applying insights across Plaud App, web, and desktop — Plaud Intelligence is the AI engine behind every experience in the Plaud ecosystem.
- Capture with multimodal input
  - Capture or import audio
  - Press or tap to highlight
  - Input text to add context
  - Enrich context with images
- Extract AI transcripts & contextual summaries
  - AI transcription in 112 languages with speaker labels and custom vocabulary
  - Generate multiple summaries from one conversation automatically, empowered by 10,000+ expert templates
  - Developed on the best LLMs: GPT-5.2, Claude Sonnet 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, and more
- Utilize intelligence across your workflow
  - Ask Plaud: Get reference-based answers, generate insights, and save as notes
  - AutoFlow: Automate transcription, summaries, and delivery with set rules
  - Cross-platform sync with unlimited cloud storage.
  - Export, share, and integrate into your workflow
  - Plaud App and Plaud Web: Manage all your notes, summaries, and insights in one place.


[Privacy & Compliance]

Plaud is built with enterprise-grade security and global compliance standards, so your data stays safe, private, and under your control.
- ISO 27001 Compliant: Global standard for information security, keeping your data confidential, intact, and available.
- ISO 27701 Compliant: Global privacy standard, ensures personal data is managed responsibly and transparently.
- GDPR Compliant: Aligns with Europe's strictest privacy regulations
- SOC 2 Compliant: Independently audited systems for security and confidentiality
- HIPAA Compliant: Protects medical and personal health data
- EN 18031 Compliant: Meets European standards for secure wireless communication


[AI Plans]

Starter Plan: Included with any Plaud AI note taker purchase. Enjoy 300 minutes of transcription every month. Comes with access to all Plaud Intelligence features—multimodal input, multidimensional summaries, Ask Plaud, and more.

Pro Plan & Unlimited Plan: Designed for high-demanding or professional use. Pro offers 1,200 minutes per month, while Unlimited removes all time limits.

title: Studocu: AI Notes & Summaries
description:
Record your classes and get instant AI notes. Studocu’s lecture recorder captures every word, generates transcripts and summaries in seconds, and turns classes into quizzes and organized study notes. Use Studocu as your all-in-one summary AI note taker and lecture recorder.

New: Class Recording
- Record lectures, seminars, and study groups in the app
- Full transcripts for accurate note taking
- AI summaries that highlight key points
- One-tap study tools: quizzes and organized study notes



Why students choose Studocu
- Lecture note taker and recorder designed for classes
- AI notes and summaries that save time
- Core AI note taking tools available at no cost
- Personalized study lists to keep materials organized
- Built for college and high school coursework across subjects



More tools to boost your grades
- Ask AI Anything for step-by-step explanations in math, science, and languages
- AI Camera Solver: take a photo of a problem and get clear guidance
- AI Quiz Maker: turn any transcript or notes into practice questions
- Massive study library with notes, guides, and practice exams
- Homework helper with trusted answers from AI and fellow students



How it helps you study smarter
- Capture lectures, transcribe, and summarize for stress-free note taking
- Turn lessons into quizzes to test yourself
- Organize transcripts, notes, and quizzes by course
- Search across your notes, transcripts, and summaries


Built for student life
- Fast setup before class starts
- Works for large lecture halls and small study groups
- Reliable for in-person and online classes


From quick homework help to advanced lecture recording, Studocu is the AI note taker for students who want to study smarter, not harder.

Download now and transform lectures into notes, summaries, and quizzes.

Support and info
 Customer Support: https://www.studocu.com/en/support
 Privacy Policy: https://www.studocu.com/en/privacy-policy
 Terms of Use: https://www.studocu.com/en/terms

title: Smart Notes & Lists
description:
Smart Notes & Lists – Your All-in-One Notes, Tasks & Productivity App
Smart Notes & Lists is your all-in-one note-taking, to-do list, and task management app designed to simplify your life. Whether you’re capturing ideas, managing daily tasks, or planning big projects, everything is just a tap away.

📞 Unique Aftercall Notes & Tasks
Never lose important details again! Smart Notes & Lists shows an aftercall screen that lets you identify incoming calls and instantly create notes, task lists, quick replies, and schedule calendar events right after you hang up. Perfect for follow-ups, reminders, or next steps related to your calls.

📝 Top Features
✅ Smart Note-Taking: Quickly jot down your ideas, create detailed notes, and add checklists to stay organized.
✅ Smart Checklists – Create to-do lists, shopping lists, or daily checklists with easy tap-to-complete items.
✅ Effortless Editing – Update and organize your notes and checklists anytime, anywhere.
✅ Powerful Search – Find what you need in seconds with our smart search feature.
✅ Calendar Integration – Link tasks to dates, set reminders, and plan your schedule all in one place.
✅ Reminders & Notifications – Get timely reminders with customizable date, time, and repeat settings so you never miss a thing.
✅ Favorites – Pin your most important notes for quick access with just one tap.
✅ Multi-Language Support – Use the app in your preferred language – perfect for global users.
✅ Attachments – Add photos from your camera or gallery to bring your notes to life.

⭐ Why Choose Smart Notes & Lists?
✔️ Combines notes, to-do lists, calendar, reminders, and aftercall tasks in one easy app.
✔️ Clean, simple, and intuitive design.
✔️ Saves time, keeps you focused, and helps you stay on top of daily life.
✔️ Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who loves to stay organized.

📲 Download Smart Notes & Lists Now!
Stay organized, save time, and get more done — the smart way!
Download today and see how easy it is to plan, note, and achieve more every day.

👉 Need help or have suggestions? 📩 Contact us anytime!

title: Turbo AI - Notetaker
description:
Turbolearn AI is now Turbo AI! We've rebranded and upgraded our AI-powered platform to transform audio, video, and text into exceptional study materials—generating high-quality notes, quizzes, flashcards, and podcasts instantly.

Turbo's advanced AI creates engaging notes featuring tables, emojis, diagrams, and equations, all synced seamlessly across our app and website (http://www.turbo.ai). Enhance your learning experience by chatting directly with your notes to extract deeper insights.

Students and professionals alike use Turbo AI for lecture notes, meeting summaries, journaling, and more.

Key Features:
- Rich Notes: Beautifully formatted notes with diagrams, equations, tables, and emojis.
- Quiz Questions: Instantly create amazing quiz questions from your notes.
- Flashcards: Effortlessly generate effective flashcards for quick review.
- Podcasts: Turn lengthy content into engaging, easy-to-follow podcasts.
- Folders: Easily organize notes into customizable folders for better management.
- Real-Time Sync: Sync notes across devices with instant updates.

Turbo AI is the better alternative to Coconote, Wave AI, Mindgrasp, and Study Fetch. 

Questions or ideas? Reach out to us at contact@turbolearn.ai :)

Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

title: Notion: Notes, Tasks, AI
description:
Notion is an AI-powered all-in-one workspace that helps individuals and teams write notes, manage tasks, organize projects, and collaborate in one place. Whether you’re tracking personal to-do lists, writing and organizing class notes, or managing projects with a team, Notion helps users plan work, stay organized, and achieve goals.

"AI's everything app" — Forbes

Notion is a productivity app where you can write, plan, and organize your notes, projects, tasks and more. Ask Notion AI about project updates, upcoming tasks, and suggestions for a more streamlined workflow.

Simplify writing notes, project and task management, and collaboration. Whether for personal, student or professional use, Notion scales to meet your individual needs with customization tools for everyone.

NEW features:
• AI Meeting Notes: Perfect meeting memory. Your notetaker catches every detail and delivers actionable summaries, right where you work.
• Maps View: Turn databases into interactive maps. Use the new Place property to pin restaurants, trips, offices, clients, and more.

FREE FOR PERSONAL USE
Individuals manage day-to-day tasks, notes, and personal organization.
• Create as many notes, docs, and content as you want.
• Use one of thousands of templates to get started.

FREE TO TRY WITH YOUR TEAM
Teams run on Notion every day, from next-generation startups to established enterprises.
• Import Google Docs, PDFs, and other content types easily to get started
• Write and organize meeting notes, or transcribe with AI.
• Collaboration and team work at your fingertips, in one connected workspace.
• Connect tools like Figma, Slack, and GitHub to Notion.

FREE FOR STUDENTS
Students organize notes, assignments, and study plans in one place.
• Your study planner, class notes, to do lists and more, your way. Loved by millions of students worldwide.
• Get organized for your best school year yet with beautiful, customizable templates created by students, for students.

NOTES & DOCS
Communication is made efficient with Notion's flexible building blocks.
• Create docs with beautiful templates, images, to-dos, and 50+ more content types.
• Meeting notes, projects, design systems, pitch decks, and more.
• Find exactly what you need using Search with powerful filters to find content across your workspace.

TASKS & PROJECTS
Catch all details big and small in any workflow.
• Workflow manager: Create your own priority labels, status tags, and automations to choose the exact info you want to track.
• Capture every detail in a table. Break projects into manageable tasks to get the work done.

AI
One tool that does it all - search, generate, analyze, and chat - right inside Notion.
• Create notes. Transcribe meeting notes with AI.
• Turn databases into interactive maps. Use the new Place property to pin restaurants, trips, offices, clients, and more.
• Write better. Use Notion AI to help write and brainstorm.
• Get answers. Ask Notion AI questions about all your content and get answers in seconds.
• Autofill tables. Notion AI turns overwhelming data into clear, actionable information  — automatically.

SYNCS WITH BROWSER, MAC, AND WINDOWS APPS.
• Pick up on mobile where you left off on desktop.

MORE PRODUCTIVITY. FEWER TOOLS.
• Track to-dos, write notes, create docs, and manage projects in one connected workspace.

THINK IT. MAKE IT.

title: Fieldy - AI note taker
description:
This is a companion app for the Fieldy necklace. It generates memories, tasks and intelligently spots patterns in your life based on what it hears.
*includes in-app purchases
descriptionHTML:
This is a companion app for the Fieldy necklace. It generates memories, tasks and intelligently spots patterns in your life based on what it hears.
*includes in-app purchases

title: Meeting.ai: AI Visual Notes
description:
Meeting.ai records, transcribes, and creates visual meeting minutes automatically. Just tap start and focus on the conversation while AI captures everything.

After each meeting, you get hand-drawn diagrams and visual summaries that help you remember 65% more information than text-only notes. Our AI creates visual meeting minutes that actually make sense—turning complex discussions into clear, memorable diagrams you can share with your team.

The app recognizes who's speaking and labels them automatically. Tag someone once, and Meeting.ai remembers them forever. Search by speaker name to find what specific people said in any meeting. No more wondering who said what or when important decisions were made.

During your meeting, chat with AI in real-time. Instantly fact-check statements, define technical terms, or ask clarifying questions without interrupting the flow. It's like having a smart assistant sitting beside you, ready to explain acronyms, verify data, or provide context when you need it.

Meeting.ai works everywhere you meet—conference rooms, coffee shops, Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet. It transcribes in 30+ languages instantly, even when speakers switch mid-sentence. Perfect for sales calls, client meetings, team standups, lectures, interviews, medical consultations, and personal voice notes.

Every meeting becomes searchable. Find any discussion, decision, or detail from your entire meeting history in seconds. Export meeting minutes and transcripts to your favorite tools. Share with a link or protect with a PIN.

Download Meeting.ai—the AI note-taker built for real, in-person conversations.

Download Meeting.ai—the AI note-taker built for real, in-person conversations.

title: HiNoter - AI Note Taker
description:
HiNoter helps you capture every idea — automatically recording, transcribing, and summarizing meetings, lectures, and interviews so you can stay focused on what truly matters.
With one tap, HiNoter records crystal-clear audio, generates accurate transcripts with speaker labels, and creates concise summaries and AI-powered mind maps. Ask questions like “What were the main takeaways from today’s team meeting?” and get instant, intelligent answers.

Why HiNoter?
●Stay focused — Be present in the moment while HiNoter takes perfect notes for you.
●Save hours — Get AI-generated summaries and mind maps that help you see the big picture instantly.
●Search smarter — Type a keyword to jump straight to that moment in your audio.
●Collaborate easily — Share recordings and notes with your team whenever you want.
●Your data, your control — HiNoter protects your recordings with enterprise-grade security, and sharing is always your choice.

Who Uses HiNoter?
●Professionals: Capture meetings, action items, and client discussions.
●Students: Record and review lectures and study sessions.
●Researchers & Journalists: Transcribe and organize interviews.
●Everyone: From brainstorming to voice memos, HiNoter handles it all.

Key Features
●One-tap recording and AI transcription
●HiNoter automatically joins your calendar meetings to record and summarize
●Upload audio files or YouTube links for instant transcription
●Speaker identification with high accuracy
●AI-generated summaries and mind maps
●Ask AI anything about your recordings
●All your recordings and notes are securely encrypted

Subscription Plans:
Description: This is a continuous subscription service (Weekly / Yearly). During the subscription period, users can access all features of the app without limitation.
Payment: Once the purchase is confirmed, the corresponding fee will be charged from the user's iTunes account.
Auto-Renewal: 24 hours before the current subscription period ends, Apple will automatically charge the corresponding fee from your iTunes account to renew the plan (weekly or yearly). Once the renewal is successful, your membership will be extended for the next billing cycle.
Cancellation: To avoid being charged for the next cycle, please cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the current period expires. After cancellation, no further charges will be made.

Terms of Service: https://recorder.nieruo.com/agreement/terms-of-service.html
Privacy Policy: https://recorder.nieruo.com/agreement/privacy-policy.html

title: Smart Notes
description:
Smart Notes - Capture Your Ideas Smartly!

Smart Notes is a free notepad app that combines memo, notes, to-do list, and diary features in one place. From simple memos to multilingual translation, voice input, and text-to-speech, we offer everything you need.

Looking for a notepad? Need a notes app? Want to manage your to-do list? Smart Notes has you covered!


[NOTEPAD FEATURES]

- Quickly create simple memos
- Voice input for hands-free note-taking (voice memo)
- Assign colors to notes for instant visual recognition
- Batch change colors for multiple notes at once
- 8 sorting options including color, date created, date modified, and title
- Share memos with other apps
- Listen to memos with text-to-speech (TTS)
- Lock, protect, and mark notes as complete
- 5-level font size adjustment
- Note search function


[TRANSLATION]

Translate your memos into over 30 languages. Save translations as new notes or overwrite existing ones. Perfect multilingual notepad for travel, study abroad, and business.

Supported languages: Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Persian, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Filipino, Thai, Polish, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Czech, Slovak, Hungarian, Romanian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Serbian, Slovenian, Greek, Ukrainian, Lithuanian, Latvian


[CALENDAR INTEGRATION]

- View notes by month or day based on creation or modification date
- View Google Calendar events and copy them as notes
- Manage schedule and memos together


[BACKUP AND RESTORE]

- Full database backup and restore
- Automatic backup support
- Export and import individual memos as text files
- Keep your precious memos safe


[TRASH]

- Restore deleted memos from trash or permanently delete them
- Never worry about accidental deletion


[HOME SCREEN WIDGETS]

- Display 3 or 6 notes directly on your home screen
- Create new notes instantly from the widget
- Quick access to your memos


[PERFECT FOR]

- Anyone looking for a simple notepad
- Those who want to record ideas with a notes app
- People who want to manage to-do lists by color
- Those who want to write a diary or journal
- Travelers and students needing translation
- Those who prefer voice-to-text for quick memos
- Users who want to check memos via home screen widget


[INFORMATION]

To use the text-to-speech (TTS) feature, install voice data in your device TTS settings. You can also tap the voice data installation button within the app. After installation, ensure your device media volume is set appropriately.

To use voice input, the Google Voice Search app must be installed.

title: Note AI: Smart Note Taker
description:
Unlock Smarter Note-Taking with Note AI
Struggling to keep with the notes while in the class or in a meeting? Say goodbye to the hassle of manual note-taking! Note AI will transform the way you capture, organize, and study. Get ready to experience effortless, AI-powered notes that will improve your productivity and learning!

Effortless Transcription, Anytime, Anywhere
Note AI's cutting-edge technology lets you easily transcribe audio to text. No more missing important details. Record lectures, meetings, and voice memos. Record and transcribe with a single tap. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who needs to capture important details without the hassle of typing.

Why You’ll Love It:
• AI-Powered Notes: Transcribe your audio into clean, organized text.
• Transcribe Video to Text: Upload and transcribe videos effortlessly.
• Multiple Languages: Transcribe and translate in over 50 languages.
• Voice to Text: Capture your thoughts hands-free, whether you're on the go or at your desk.
• AI Study Notes: Generate custom study notes from your recordings, tailored to your learning style.

Enhance Your Study and Learning with AI 
Maximize your productivity with AI-generated study aids. Let Note AI generate flashcards, summaries, and quizzes that help you learn faster and smarter. No more boring, time-consuming note-taking—just useful study materials that you can actually use! 

How It Helps You Study:
= Lecture Summaries: Capture the key points and get summaries.
= Customizable Study Tools: Create personalized quizzes, flashcards, and summaries, tailored for you!
= Instant AI Notes: Generate notes automatically from audio recordings—just press record, and let AI do the rest!

Easy Collaboration and Multilingual Support
Working with a group? No worries! Note AI lets you sync your notes and recordings across all your devices. Share your notes with anyone, anywhere, instantly.

Descript AI Accuracy: Benefit from context-aware transcriptions for precise and reliable notes in any language.

Your All-in-One Audio to Text Solution
AI Note Taker is more than a note recorder—it's your go-to tool for capturing and organizing information. Whether you're recording a voice memo, meeting transcription, or lecture notes, our app provides a hassle-free solution to all your note-taking needs.

Why use Note AI?
- Fast & Accurate Transcription: Transcribe audio and video with precision.
- AI Summaries & Study Aids: Save time with automated summaries and learning tools.
- Free Speech-to-Text App: Enjoy powerful features without breaking the bank.
- Secure & Accessible: Your data is safe and always available across devices.

Perfect For:
Students: Capture lectures and let AI turn them into study-ready notes.
Professionals: Record meetings and never miss a thing again.
Creators: Record and transcribe videos or voice memos for your projects.

Ready to change the way you take notes and study? Download Note AI today and revolutionize how you take notes, transcribe audio, and learn faster with AI! Designed to make your life easier.


https://noteaiapp.com/terms
https://noteaiapp.com/privacy

AI Note Taker is more than a note recorder—it's your go-to tool for capturing and organizing information. Whether you're recording a voice memo, meeting transcription, or lecture notes, our app provides a hassle-free solution to all your note-taking needs.

Why use Note AI?
- Fast & Accurate Transcription: Transcribe audio and video with precision.
- AI Summaries & Study Aids: Save time with automated summaries and learning tools.
- Free Speech-to-Text App: Enjoy powerful features without breaking the bank.
- Secure & Accessible: Your data is safe and always available across devices.

Perfect For:
Students: Capture lectures and let AI turn them into study-ready notes.
Professionals: Record meetings and never miss a thing again.
Creators: Record and transcribe videos or voice memos for your projects.

Ready to change the way you take notes and study? Download Note AI today and revolutionize how you take notes, transcribe audio, and learn faster with AI! Designed to make your life easier.


https://noteaiapp.com/terms
https://noteaiapp.com/privacy
summary: Transcribe audio to text instantly—speech to text & AI-powered note-taking!

title: Freenotes - Notes Taking & PDF
description:
Freenotes: The Ultimate Digital Note-Taking Solution for Study and Work
Freenotes lets you experience true paperless learning, combining the pleasure of realistic handwriting with features that boost your study and work efficiency. Whether you're a college student needing PDF annotation or a professional seeking a high-efficiency meeting note tool, Freenotes is the best GoodNotes alternative for a seamless, productive experience across all your devices.

AI Integration: Your Smart Study Assistant
A handwriting app with built-in AI to summarize long notes or check grammar/spelling in handwritten text？
Freenotes is equipped with a powerful AI Assistant designed to optimize your learning and reviewing process:
- Instant Summaries & Answers: Take a screenshot or upload a document (PDF or photo) to instantly get answers to questions and AI-generated summaries of content. Perfect for quickly understanding long documents or creating study outlines for exams.
- AI Study Companion: Use the assistant to clarify concepts, define terms, and check your handwritten notes for accuracy, turning passive review into active recall.
  
  High-Efficiency Note-Taking & Organization
What's a high-quality app to handwrite meeting notes and convert them into searchable text?
We focus on helping you solve the pain point of messy, unsearchable notes:
- Organized and Neat: The folder feature allows you to categorize and organize your notes by projects, courses, or topics, automating the organization of your note library.
- Quick Search via OCR: No more wasting time searching! Our advanced handwriting OCR (Optical Character Recognition) means you can easily find the specific note or keyword you need, even if it was handwritten.
  
  Academic Powerhouse: PDF Annotation & Learning Tools
Best Pad note-taking app for college students？ Recommend an aesthetic digital planner app for tablets that works with hyperlinked PDFs？
Freenotes offers features essential for college students and professionals working with documents:
- Interactive PDF Annotation: Annotate, mark up, and highlight large PDF files. Select text to translate and look up words directly for more convenient and engaging learning.
- Hyperlink Support: Create hyperlinked digital planners or study guides that jump to different pages within your notes or to external web pages for easy access to related information.
  
Multitasking & Focus: Master Video Learning
"Take notes while watching videos," "Split-screen for courses."
Maximize productivity by taking notes while consuming content:
- Seamless Video Learning: Use Picture-in-Picture (PiP) to take notes while watching online videos (YouTube, lecture recordings), and instantly capture relevant screenshots directly into your notes.
- Dedicated Course Learning View: Display your handwritten notes or mind maps alongside course content in a specialized split-screen setup for deeper understanding and quick review.
  
Review & Memorization for Active Recall
"Helps with active recall," "Exam preparation tool."
We provide specific tools proven to aid memory:
- Active Recall Tape Tool: Use the tape tool to mark key information for memorization and quickly test yourself by toggling visibility—a powerful technique for active recall and exam preparation.
- Exam Prep Center: Access built-in exam materials, timers, and use in-app layers and split-screen to practice and simulate exams without re-importing files.
  
  A True Paper Feel: Natural & Customizable Writing
What app has the most natural and lowest-latency writing feel on a tablet?
- Realistic Pen Strokes: Experience lifelike, low-latency pen strokes on electronic devices by combining handwriting pens, providing the most natural feel for writing on digital platforms.
- Customization: Create and save custom brushes for quick access. Freenotes now supports the latest features of  Pencil.
